property.name: query
property.value: select agent_uri, sign_in_time, sign_out_time from acd_agent_stat where sign_in_time >= ? and sign_out_time < ? and location_fqdn = ?

property.name: query
property.value: select agent_uri, sum(sign_out_time - sign_in_time) as time_signed_in, max(sign_out_time - sign_in_time) as max_time_signed_in from acd_agent_stat where sign_in_time >= ? and sign_out_time < ? and location_fqdn = ? group by agent_uri

property.name: query
property.value: select c.agent_uri, count(*) as num_calls, sum(c.terminate_time - c.pick_up_time) as handle_duration, avg(c.terminate_time - c.pick_up_time) as avg_handle_duration, max(c.terminate_time - c.pick_up_time) as max_handle_duration, min(c.terminate_time - c.pick_up_time) as min_handle_duration from acd_call_stat as c where c.agent_uri in (select distinct agent_uri from acd_agent_stat) and c.state = 'terminate' and c.terminate_time >= ? and c.pick_up_time < ? and location_fqdn = ? group by c.agent_uri

property.name: query
property.value: select queue_uri, count(*) as num_calls, count(pick_up_time) as num_calls_answered, count(*) - count(pick_up_time) as num_calls_abandoned from acd_call_stat where terminate_time >= ? and enter_time < ? and location_fqdn = ? group by queue_uri

property.name: query
property.value: select queue_uri, count(*) as num_calls, avg(pick_up_time - enter_time) as avg_wait_time, max(pick_up_time - enter_time) as max_wait_time from acd_call_stat where state = 'terminate' and terminate_time >= ? and pick_up_time < ? and location_fqdn = ? group by queue_uri

property.name: query
property.value: select queue_uri, count(*) as num_calls, avg(terminate_time - enter_time) as avg_wait_time, max(terminate_time - enter_time) as max_wait_time from acd_call_stat where state = 'unanswered' and terminate_time >= ? and enter_time < ? and location_fqdn = ? group by queue_uri

property.name: query
property.value: select queue_uri, enter_time, terminate_time - enter_time as abandon_time, from_uri from acd_call_stat where state = 'unanswered' and terminate_time >= ? and enter_time < ? and location_fqdn = ?

property.name: query
property.value: select agent_uri, queue_uri, enter_time, terminate_time, terminate_time - enter_time as duration, from_uri from acd_call_stat where state = 'terminate' and terminate_time >= ? and pick_up_time < ? and location_fqdn = ?
